title: Cleanse / Diet
description: Ayurvedic Rasayanas uses powdered extracts, raw herbs and essentials oils based in ghee, honey and brown rice syrup. Rasayanas, teas and spice masalas for each dosha. Massage oil for sleep and hair. Massage oil for the body, nerves and joints. Products for the liver, kidneys, heart, lungs, pancreas, skin, digestion.
